DOC.brief_summary: This study tries to collect clinical cases to compare the clinical effect of traditional root canal disinfection, to photodynamic in root canal disinfection .And provide the reference for clinical application and experience.
DOC.brief_title: Estimate the Effect of the Photo-activated Disinfection on the Root Canal Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: The study of groups: Group1:2%Sodium hypochlorite ultrasonic irrigation+17%EDTA Group2:2%Sodium hypochlorite ultrasonic irrigation+17%EDTA+PDT Group3:1%Sodium hypochlorite ultrasonic irrigation+17%EDTA+PDT Microbiological measurement. Filled with sterile PBS, the root canals were sampled immediately before and after the disinfection procedures.
